ComicInfo.Summary:
Uncle Creepy emcees an execrable exhibition from some of horror comics’ most talented creators! Paul Tobin and Juan Ferreyra share the tidings of a grim guardian angel, and J. Torres and Ron Salas mount some twisted taxidermy! Creeps unite!
New story from Colder team Paul Tobin and Juan Ferreyra!
*Story Titles* The Human Condition The Creepy Family in "Old-School Technology" Arrangement of Skin The Creepy Family in "Meet the 'rents" The Duel of Monsters The Creepy Family in "Back To the Drawing Board"
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/creepy-17/4000-462218/
ComicInfo.Writer: Archie Goodwin,Dan Braun,J. Torres,Paul Tobin,Peter Bagge,Sergio Aragonés
